metadata.Title: CVE-2023-28155 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** UNSUPPORTED WHEN ASSIGNED ** The Request package through 2.88.1 for Node.js allows a bypass of SSRF mitigations via an attacker-controller server that does a cross-protocol redirect (HTTP to HTTPS, or HTTPS to HTTP). NOTE: This vulnerability only affects products that are no longer supported by the maintainer.

criterions.comment: node-request package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
